statements: UPDATE Employee SET name='John Doe', salary=50000.00 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Employee SET email='johndoe@example.com', salary=60000.00, encrypted_data=bytea('some_encrypted_data') WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Employee SET name='Alice', salary=75000 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Employee SET email='bob@example.com', salary=80000, encrypted_data=DECODE('AABBCC', 'hex') WHERE id=2;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET sensitive_info='Updated sensitive data' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_info='Updated encrypted data' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET sensitive_info = 'Updated Info' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encrypted_data SET encrypted_info = 'New Data' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE encryption_keys SET encryption_type='AES-256' WHERE key_id=2;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET name = 'John Doe', ssn = '123-45-6789' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE encryption_keys SET encryption_key = 'S3cr3tK3y', encryption_type = 'AES-256' WHERE key_id = 3;
UPDATE Employee SET salary = 60000 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE Customer SET address = '123 Main St, Anytown' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE Employee SET full_name = 'John Doe', salary = 75000 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE Customer SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', address = '1234 Main St, Anytown' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', encrypted_phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_name = 'New Product', encrypted_price = 99.99 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET encrypted_price = 199.99, encrypted_description = 'High-quality product' WHERE product_id = 201;
